author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Movit Media Announces Shareholder Approval Of Matters In Connection With Reverse Takeover Transaction
text:
April 13, 2018 / 6:01 PM / Updated 15 minutes ago BRIEF-Movit Media Announces Shareholder Approval Of Matters In Connection With Reverse Takeover Transaction Reuters Staff 
  Movit Media Corp: 
* CORP. ANNOUNCES SHAREHOLDER APPROVAL OF MATTERS IN CONNECTION WITH REVERSE TAKEOVER TRANSACTION 
* SHAREHOLDERS VOTED IN FAVOUR OF CERTAIN MATTERS RELATED TO ACQUISITION OF ALL OF ISSUED AND OUTSTANDING SHARES OF ETHEREUM CAPITAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
